resources.string:
Common Name: Milkfish 
 Local name: Bangus, Awa 
 Max Size: 180cm (Commonly 60-100cm) 
 Biodiversity: Marine, Brackish, Freshwater, Benthopelagic, Endemic 
 Fishing Season: All Year Long
In these tables are the categories and list of tilapia feeds and its given nutrients.
